entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -28.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 9:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
